thread.title: Today Corrupt Officials Spend Your Money -- Tomorrow Blockchain Will Stop Them
thread.title_full: Today Corrupt Officials Spend Your Money -- Tomorrow Blockchain Will Stop Them

author: Farah Mohamed
title: Today Corrupt Officials Spend Your Money -- Tomorrow Blockchain Will Stop Them
text:
Email Today Corrupt Officials Spend Your Money -- Tomorrow Blockchain Will Stop Them The projects are first steps toward making governments and industries more transparent and eliminating fraud and corruption. Singularity University Posted: 10/26/2015 07:42 AM EDT KTSDESIGN via Getty Images 
Honduras has had the world’s highest murder rate for years. The Transparency International organization’s Corruption Perception Index ranks Honduras 122 out of 175 countries and describes the transparency of the country’s budgets as ‘Scant to None.’
